trans-unit.source: Represents a nonselectable <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that renders text and images and can display hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: Representa um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> não selecionável que renderiza texto e imagens e pode exibir hiperlinks.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> class to create a label that can render text and images that can implement the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> classe para criar um rótulo que pode renderizar texto e imagens que podem implementar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> also has many properties that enable it to display one or more hyperlinks, and other properties that modify the appearance and behavior of hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> também tem várias propriedades que permitem a exibição de um ou mais hiperlinks e outras propriedades que modificar a aparência e comportamento de hiperlinks.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> is like a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> that does not get focus by default and that does not render as pushed or highlighted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> é como uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> que não recebe foco por padrão e que não sejam renderizadas como enviadas por push ou realçado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> as a hosted item supports access keys.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> como um item hospedado dá suporte a chaves de acesso.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkVisited%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A> properties on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> to support link control in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkVisited%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A> propriedades em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> para oferecer suporte a controle de link em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> to contain a link by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.IsLink%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkVisited%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkBehavior%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> para conter um link, definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.IsLink%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkVisited%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkBehavior%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> class, specifying the image to display.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />, especificando a imagem a ser exibida.

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> class, specifying the text to display.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />, especificando o texto a ser exibido.

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> class, specifying the text and image to display.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />, especificando o texto e a imagem a serem exibidos.

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> acts as a link; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> atuar como um link; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> class, specifying the text and image to display and whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> acts as a link.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />, especificando o texto e a imagem a serem exibidos e se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> atua como um link.

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> acts as a link; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> atuar como um link; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" /> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador de eventos <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> class, specifying the text and image to display, whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> acts as a link, and providing a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" /> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />, especificando o texto e a imagem a serem exibidos, se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> atua como um link e fornecendo um manipulador de eventos <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" />.

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> acts as a link; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> atuar como um link; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" /> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador de eventos <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> class, specifying the text and image to display, whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> acts as a link, and providing a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" /> event handler and name for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />, especificando o texto e a imagem a serem exibidos, se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> atua como um link e fornecendo um manipulador de eventos <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" /> e nome para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color used to display an active link.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor usada para exibir um link ativo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the color to display an active link.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> que representa a cor para exibir um link ativo.

trans-unit.source: The default color is specified by the system.
trans-unit.target: A cor padrão é especificada pelo sistema.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this color is <see langword="Color.Red" />.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, essa cor é <see langword="Color.Red" />.

trans-unit.source: An active link is a link that is in the process of being clicked.
trans-unit.target: Um link ativo é um link que está no processo de ser clicado.

trans-unit.source: This is similar to the depressed state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control.
trans-unit.target: Isso é semelhante ao estado pressionado de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controle.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to specify the color that the link is displayed in when the link is in the process of being clicked.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para especificar a cor que o link será exibido no quando o link está no processo de ser clicado.

trans-unit.source: There are a number of colors associated with a link.
trans-unit.target: Há um número de cores associadas a um link.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A> specifies the color of all links displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A> Especifica a cor de todos os links exibidos no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> property enables you to specify the color of a link after it has been visited by the user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> propriedade permite que você especifique a cor de um link depois que ele foi visitado pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly.
trans-unit.target: Ao definir essa propriedade, certifique-se de que a cor que você está definindo a propriedade não está em conflito com a cor do plano de fundo do controle ou o texto não é exibida corretamente.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is in the process of being clicked.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se a cor do plano de fundo do controle é `Color.Red` e essa propriedade é definida como `Color.Red`, o texto não é exibido corretamente quando o link está sendo clicado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> to contain a link by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.IsLink%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkVisited%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkBehavior%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> para conter um link, definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.IsLink%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkVisited%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkBehavior%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the selectable state of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica o estado selecionável de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> is a nonselectable <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> é um nonselectable <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objeto de acessibilidade para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> is a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> é um hiperlink.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> is a hyperlink; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> é um hiperlink; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> to contain a link by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.IsLink%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkVisited%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkBehavior%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> para conter um link, definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.IsLink%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkVisited%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkBehavior%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the behavior of a link.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que representa o comportamento de um link.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="LinkBehavior.SystemDefault" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="LinkBehavior.SystemDefault" />.

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to specify the behavior of links when they are displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade permite que você especifique o comportamento dos links quando eles são exibidos no controle.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want links to be displayed with an underline only when the mouse pointer is over a link, you can set this property to `LinkBehavior.HoverUnderline`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você quiser links para ser exibido com um sublinhado somente quando o ponteiro do mouse está sobre um link, você pode definir essa propriedade `LinkBehavior.HoverUnderline`.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the types of behaviors that can be associated with a link, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os tipos de comportamentos que podem ser associados um link, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> to contain a link by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.IsLink%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkVisited%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkBehavior%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> para conter um link, definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.IsLink%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkVisited%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkBehavior%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color used when displaying a normal link.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor usada ao exibir um link normal.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the color used to displaying a normal link.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> que representa a cor usada ao exibir um link normal.

trans-unit.source: The default color is specified by the system.
trans-unit.target: A cor padrão é especificada pelo sistema.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this color is <see langword="Color.Blue" />.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, essa cor é <see langword="Color.Blue" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> to contain a link by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.IsLink%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkVisited%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkBehavior%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> para conter um link, definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.IsLink%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkVisited%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkBehavior%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a link should be displayed as though it were visited.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se um link deve ser exibido como se tivesse sido visitado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if links should display as though they were visited; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se links deve ser exibido como se eles foram visitados; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control does not automatically denote that a link is a visited link.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> controle não denota automaticamente um link é um link visitado.

trans-unit.source: To display the link as a visited link, you can set the value of this property to `true` in an event handler for the click event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Para exibir o link como um link visitado, você pode definir o valor dessa propriedade como `true` em um manipulador de eventos para o evento de clique do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.

trans-unit.source: A visited link is displayed using the color specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> control.
trans-unit.target: É exibido um link visitado usando a cor especificada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> to contain a link by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.IsLink%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkVisited%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkBehavior%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> para conter um link, definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.IsLink%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkVisited%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkBehavior%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.OnFontChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.OnFontChanged%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.OnFontChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.OnFontChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.OnFontChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.OnFontChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseEnter" /> event.

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: O caractere a ser processado.

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: Processa um caractere mnemônico.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o caractere tiver sido processado como mnemônico pelo controle; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called to give an item the opportunity to process a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado para dar a oportunidade de processar um caractere mnemônico de um item.

trans-unit.source: The method should determine whether the item is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: O método deve determinar se o item está em estado de mnemônicos de processo e se se o caractere especificado representa um mnemônico.

trans-unit.source: If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se assim, o método deve executar a ação associada ao mnemônico e retorno `true`.

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se não, o método deve retornar `false`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> implementation relies on the host <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> control to call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A> method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the item's text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> implementação depende do host <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controle para chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A> método para determinar se o caractere especificado corresponde a um mnemônico no texto do item.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the method selects the item associated with the label, or raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> event if the item cannot be selected.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o método seleciona o item associado com o rótulo ou gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> evento se o item não pode ser selecionado.

trans-unit.source: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
trans-unit.target: para todas as janelas de herança de classes para chamar esse método.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see langword="AllWindows" /> value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see langword="AllWindows" /> valor <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color used when displaying a link that that has been previously visited.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor usada ao exibir um link que foi visitado anteriormente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the color used to display links that have been visited.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> que representa a cor usada para exibir os links que foram visitados.

trans-unit.source: The default color is specified by the system.
trans-unit.target: A cor padrão é especificada pelo sistema.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this color is <see langword="Color.Purple" />.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, essa cor é <see langword="Color.Purple" />.

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to specify the color that is displayed for all links in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> that have been visited by the user.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade permite que você especifique a cor que é exibida para todos os links de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> que visitado pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly.
trans-unit.target: Ao definir essa propriedade, certifique-se de que a cor que você está definindo a propriedade não está em conflito com a cor do plano de fundo do controle ou o texto não é exibida corretamente.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is displayed as a visited link.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se a cor do plano de fundo do controle é `Color.Red` e essa propriedade é definida como `Color.Red`, o texto não é exibido corretamente quando o link será exibido como um link visitado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> to contain a link by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.IsLink%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkVisited%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkBehavior%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> para conter um link, definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.IsLink%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkVisited%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel.LinkBehavior%2A> propriedades.
